text:
2. 變身5日亞太區外遊數據
須於啟動服務後48小時內，登入賬戶以轉換為外遊數據，逾期將不能轉換。
3. 自動續購
在新卡外遊優惠組合到期前，如儲值額達$42，系統將會自動續購「30日/本地數據服務組合 FUP 60GB」。( 續購功能可於賬戶「主頁 > 設定」內開/關)
4. 增值並延長有效期
如想繼續使用SoSIM，請於登入賬戶後按「增值」為儲值卡增值，即可延長有效期及購買服務。
trans:
2. Transformed into 5-day Asia-Pacific roaming data
You must log in to your account within 48 hours after activating the service to convert to romaing data. Conversion will not be allowed beyond the deadline.
3. Automatic renewal
Before the expiry of the new card's roaming package, if the stored value reaches $42, the system will automatically repurchase the "30 Days/Local Data Service Package FUP 60GB". (The repurchase function can be turned on/off in the account "Home > Settings")
4. Add fund and extend validity period
If you want to continue using SoSIM, please log in to your account and click "Add Fund" to add fund to your stored-value card to extend the validity period and to purchase services.
